paper_abstract: Given a graph G and an odd cycle transversal T, we describe an elegant 0*(2(vertical bar T vertical bar)) algorithm for determining whether G has a smaller odd cycle transversal that is disjoint from T. We believe that our algorithm, based on a reduction to VERTEX COVER, is conceptually simpler than the known algorithms for the problem and refines the understanding of the relationship between ODD CYCLE TRANSVERSAL and VERTEX COVER. paper_title: Another disjoint compression algorithm for odd cycle transversal
